programme.title: Implement Me No Directives!
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke judges the language used by the Old Testament, Churchill and UN treaties.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke contemplates the excellence of the Old Testament as a work of literature, Churchill's use of language and the wording of UN treaties.
